articles.description: Campa Cola comes back when consumers are moving away from sugary drinks as more and more healthy beverages enter the market. It remains to be seen how a revived Campa Cola negotiates a world vastly different from the times when it ruled the Indian market.
articles.content: After nearly 30 years, iconic brand Campa Cola has made a comeback. Reliance Consumer Products Ltd, which is part of the Reliance Group, is launching the Campa brand nationally in the cola, lemon and… [+5972 chars]
